RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Toggle Reference Track
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Creates a prepared track with a gainer device that will toggle solo`d and muted relative to all other tracks. This allows quick AB`ing of mixes to the current song. Menu Entry `Create Reference Track` in the instrument box and a `Toggle Reference Track `shortcut are provided.
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: scripts
